values: The unwasted life is the life that recognizes that God’s love for us consists primarliy, not in him making much of us, but in bringing us at great cost to the enjoyment of  making much of him forever. The unwasted life is the life that recognizes that God’s love for us consists primarliy, not in him making much of us, but in bringing us at great cost to the enjoyment of  making much of him forever.
